citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:57pm on
22-May-17.
ACI Bartels arrived at the facility, knocked on the front door of the residence, honked the horn of the government
owned vehicle, and called and left a message on the number provided while waiting for 30 minutes at the facility.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
